traits.name: Spell Turning
entries: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Head
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The chimera exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (5d12 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
